name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ralph MASER, Appellant

casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 335
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ralph MASER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 7, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
Patrick J. O’Connor, Southampton (court-appointed), for appellant.
Stephen B. Harris, First Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
